START.name: Beach
START.desc:
You wake up and find yourself on the beach, you must've 
fallen asleep. There isn't a cloud in the sky, you can 
hear seagulls in the distance and you can smell food from the boardwalk 
to the east. You can go in any direction.

MORE BEACH.name: Beach
MORE BEACH.desc:
You walk further down the shoreline, but it doesn't seem like anything interesting
 will happen if you keep walking this way. But ther is the ocean to
 the north and the boardwalk to the south.

OCEAN.name: Ocean
OCEAN.desc:
You wade into the water, suprisingly, it isn't cold...or maybe that's 
just a warm spot. Ew. I'd swim in a different direction if I were you.

BOARDWALK.name: Boardwalk
BOARDWALK.desc:
You walk towards the boardwalk, you can hear kids laughing at the carnival further south.
There's also a very good looking hot dog stand to the east.

HOT DOG.name: Hot Dog Stand
HOT DOG.desc: You eat a hot dog, it's the best thing you've had in your life. The vendor mutters about something in the ocean

CARNIVAL.name: Carnival
CARNIVAL.desc:
You walk through the carnival, there's kids running around from ride to ride with 
their parents close behind. The carnies loudly advertise their games 
from all sides except the north. Otherwise it seems like a dead end.

SWIMWRONGWAY.name: Ocean
SWIMWRONGWAY.desc: Nothing in this direction. But there's still something over the waves to the north.

OCEANBACK.name: Ocean
OCEANBACK.desc: You swim back towards shore,the waves are shallow.

COOL FISH.name: Ocean
COOL FISH.desc:
Theres a fish in front of you like nothing you've ever seen before. It swims up to you
 and you realize it wants to show you something. Do you follow it? YES or NO

REEF.name: Coral Reef
REEF.desc: Underwater, you can see a colorful reef with fish swimming in and out of visibility. It's very pretty.

DEEPER OCEAN.name: Deeper Ocean
DEEPER OCEAN.desc:
You swim further out and the waves start to get bigger. It seems like 
there's something in the water to the north but you can't get a 
good glimpse of it.

SHIP.name: ship
SHIP.desc:
A giant wave crashes over you, and when you resurface there's a giant 
pirate ship looming above. You hear people above yelling about a man overboard 
and before you know it, you're hoisted up to the deck. You're very confused but 
the pirates insist you're one of them. Deciding to go with the flow, you 
shrug and put on a bandana. You look fantasitc. The treasure could be in any
direction but most likely not south.

TOLDYOU.name: ship on the ocean
TOLDYOU.desc: I told you there's nothing here.

SAILING.name: ship on the ocean
SAILING.desc: You sail on, you can feel the wind in your hair.

END.name: island
END.desc:
Land ho! You and your crew drop the anchor and make it to the shore. 
Conviently, there's a giant treasure chest right in the middle of the beach filled 
with gold! You each take your cut and celebrate! (To quit the game type in 'quit')
